item.description:
Ghosthunters are returning to UNH for another public presentation!

I attended Jason and Grant's presentation last year and it was very well done. They bring TAPS evidence examples, show additional footage, give anecdotes, describe scenarios, encourage audience participation, and usually end with a Q & A session.

We will want to arrive at least an hour in advance to get in line because, although the Granite State Room has a capacity of about 450 people, this event met or exceeded capacity prior to the start of the presentation last year. The entire presentation will probably conclude around 9pm.

Click here for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a burgundy hoodie near the 3rd floor information desk at 5:45.
item.name: Jason and Grant of SciFi's Ghosthunters at UNH
